location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informing that Mr John Williams, of the Civil Service at Bombay Castle, was proceeding to the Persian Gulf for the recovery of his health.
